screen_name: @goofygal1171 I see that people are taking your moment of exhausted exasperation and turning it into something else.  Please do not leave SM the way others have.  We love having you around.  For the record, I was yelling disrespectful things at the screen because I was sick of it too.

@TonyVlachos73 You guys are human beings.  While entertaining as heck to watch, you guys are real humans and the crap you as a group have to take on SM can be so toxic.  I was diagnosed with Covid-19 on Tuesday so this episode was a total joy in the midst of misery.
